title: The automatic mobile boards anger me greatly.
body:
I just want GD to be GD. If you are going to force me to look at it in this silly mobile version, atleast give me ALL the features that the full site allows... i can't even find a way to post a thread using it.. also anytime I change the page it immediately switches back to mobile so I have to hit view full site EVERY TIME I CHANGE PAGES

Rito, for the love of GD... make it stop :(
